articles.description: iFixit’s iPhone 17 Pro teardown video is out, and it looks into why people are saying the anodized aluminum phones are prone to scratches.

articles.description: Gearbox Software is delaying the Nintendo Switch 2 version of Borderlands 4. Previously, the game had been set to release on October 3rd.

articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max’s Aluminum Build Holds Up Well To Drops Against Galaxy S25 Ultra’s Titanium Alloy, But Is Susceptible To Corner Impacts - Wccftech
articles.description: A total of six drop tests were performed on the iPhone 17 Pro Max and Galaxy S25 Ultra, showing if shifting to an aluminum chassis was the right move, or sticking with the titanium alloy build

articles.title: Vertiv Stock Falls After Microsoft Reveals 'Breakthrough' Chip Cooling Tech - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Vertiv stock fell Tuesday after Microsoft announced a “breakthrough” technology for cooling AI chips in data centers using microfluidics.

articles.title: Can't upgrade your Windows 10 PC? You have 5 options - and 3 weeks to act - ZDNET
articles.description: Microsoft will end support for its most popular operating system next month. Here's what you should do with your Windows 10 PCs that fail Microsoft's Windows 11 compatibility tests - before that day arrives.

articles.title: Journals infiltrated with ‘copycat’ papers that can be written by AI - Nature
articles.description: Tools such as ChatGPT can be used to generate almost-identical research papers that pass standard plagiarism checks. Hundreds are thought to have been published.

articles.title: Two expected iPhone Air ‘weaknesses’ now look surprisingly great - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple’s ultra-thin iPhone Air was expected by many to have durability and battery life issues, but so far those fears are proving unfounded.

articles.description: Increased battery drain is far from unexpected after installing a major OS update, says Apple.
